name: Brakus the Shifter

skills.name: Innocent Blood
skills.description: Attacks 1 enemy. Heals this Champion by 15% of the damage inflicted.

effects.notes: Single-target ATK-scaling damage with 3.75 ATK multiplier
Self-heal 15% of damage inflicted, provides consistent sustain

skills.book_value: 4 books total: +5% damage (×3), +10% damage. Decent value for sustain improvement.
skills.notes: Consistent self-healing every turn. Good sustain for prolonged fights. Respectable 3.75 ATK multiplier for A1.

skills.name: Full Moon Rampage
skills.description: Attacks 1 enemy 6 times. Heals this Champion by 25% of the damage inflicted. Heals this Champion by 50% of the damage inflicted instead if the target is under a [Fear] or a [True Fear] debuff. After the first hit, has a 75% chance of placing a 25% [Weaken] debuff for 2 turns.

effects.notes: 6-hit attack, 0.97 ATK multiplier per hit. Excellent for Fire Knight shield, Warmaster procs twice per use.
Base heal 25% of total damage inflicted. Doubles to 50% if target has Fear or True Fear debuff - massive sustain.
75% chance unbooked, 100% booked. Applied after first hit. 25% reduction to ATK and DEF.

skills.book_value: 7 books total: +10% damage, +15% damage, +10% debuff chance, +15% debuff chance, -1 CD (×2). CRITICAL - brings CD to 3 turns and Weaken to 100%.
skills.notes: Core nuking skill. 6 hits = 2× Warmaster procs for massive damage. Conditional 50% heal makes Brakus nearly unkillable vs Feared targets. Book to 100% Weaken for consistency.

skills.name: Hunter's Howl
skills.description: Places a 50% [Increase ATK] buff on all allies for 3 turns, then attacks 1 enemy 3 times. Each hit has a 50% chance of placing a [True Fear] debuff for 1 turn. Has a 50% chance of placing a [Fear] debuff on 2 random enemies for 1 turn if the [True Fear] debuff is placed.

effects.notes: 50% ATK buff placed BEFORE damage, affects all allies including self. Excellent for burst setups.
3-hit attack, 2.3 ATK multiplier per hit. Hits AFTER placing Inc ATK buff for self-boosted damage.
50% chance unbooked, 75% booked PER HIT. True Fear = cannot use skills OR A1. More powerful than Fear.
Conditional: Only triggers if True Fear lands. 50% chance to Fear 2 random enemies. Fear = cannot use skills, can A1.

skills.book_value: 4 books total: +10% damage, +10% debuff chance, +15% debuff chance, -1 CD. HIGH VALUE - brings True Fear to 75% per hit and CD to 4 turns.
skills.notes: Signature skill. Inc ATK buff applies BEFORE damage for self-boosted nuke. True Fear is superior to Fear (blocks A1 too). 3 hits = up to 3 True Fear chances. Conditional Fear spread provides AOE control. Synergizes with A2's conditional 50% heal.

skills.name: Beast Mode
skills.description: Passive Effect: Damage increases by 40% when this Champion's HP drops below 40%. Active Effect: Revives this Champion with 20% HP when killed. Immediately grants an Extra Turn.

effects.notes: Passive component: 40% damage increase when HP <40%. Always active below threshold.
Active component: Self-revive at 20% HP on death. 7 turn CD unbooked, 5 turns booked.
Extra turn granted immediately upon revival. Allows instant A3 nuke or escape.

skills.book_value: 2 books total: -1 CD (×2). CRITICAL for Arena - reduces revive CD from 7 to 5 turns.
skills.notes: Signature passive. 40% damage boost makes Brakus hit HARD below 40% HP. Revive + Extra Turn = instant second chance for A3 nuke. Swift Parry set recommended for Arena: proc chance to 1-shot enemy on revive turn. Resurrection gimmick less useful in end-game Clan Boss but enables cheese revive comps.

forms.aura: Increases Ally SPD in Arena battles by 19%
forms.comments: Halloween 2019 'EXTREME FUSION' - intense grind event. Arena nuker with self-revive gimmick. 16 legendary books total (4+7+4+2). Fully booked recommended for Arena (100% Weaken, 75% True Fear, 5-turn revive CD). A-tier overall.

stat_priorities: Arena: 100% C.RATE, max C.DMG, high ATK%, SPD tuned for team
Fire Knight: 100% C.RATE, 220+ SPD, accuracy for Weaken

stat_priority_recommendations.clan_boss: Not recommended (2/10 rating) - revive gimmick doesn't scale
stat_priority_recommendations.dungeons: Fire Knight: 100% C.RATE, 220+ SPD, 200+ ACC for Weaken, ATK%/C.DMG. Excellent 6-hit A2 for shield.
stat_priority_recommendations.arena: 100% C.RATE, max C.DMG (aim 250+), high ATK%, SPD tuned to team (go after ATK buffer). Swift Parry set for proc-to-kill on revive turn.
stat_priority_recommendations.doom_tower: Similar to dungeons - use for waves/bosses with Fear synergy. 100% C.RATE, 220+ SPD, decent ACC.
stat_priority_recommendations.faction_wars: 100% C.RATE, max damage stats, sustain via lifesteal or self-heals. Fear control useful for waves.

recommended_gear: Arena (Primary): Swift Parry (4-set) + Crit Damage (2-set) OR Savage/Cruel (4-set) + Crit Damage (2-set). Swift Parry provides extra turn proc chance on revive for instant nuke.
Dungeons: Savage (4-set) + Crit Damage OR Speed (4-set) + Crit Damage. Prioritize 100% C.RATE from substats.
Sustain Build (alternative): Lifesteal (4-set) + Speed/Crit Rate (2-set). Pairs with A1/A2 self-heals for tanky nuker.
Gloves: Crit Damage% (must have 100% C.RATE from substats)
Boots: SPD (tune to team) or ATK% (if SPD from subs)
Substats: C.RATE to 100%, C.DMG, ATK%, SPD, ACC (200+ for Fire Knight Weaken)

clan_boss: Not recommended for Clan Boss (2/10 rating)
dungeons: Offense Tree (Full): Deadly Precision, Keen Strike, Heart of Glory, Single Out, Cycle of Violence, Bring it Down, Methodical, Warmaster (T6)

Support Tree (Partial): Pinpoint Accuracy (ACC boost), Charged Focus (TM on crit), Arcane Celerity (SPD buff), Evil Eye (ACC from C.RATE), Master Hexer (debuff extension - NOTE: no longer affects Fear duration per 2023 patch)
Warmaster: Procs TWICE per A2 (6-hit skill) for massive damage boost
arena: Offense Tree (Full): Same as dungeons, with Warmaster OR Helmsmasher (HellHades recommends Helmsmasher for nuking through high DEF)
Support Tree: Pinpoint Accuracy, Charged Focus
Helmsmasher vs Warmaster: Helmsmasher better for Arena (ignores DEF), Warmaster better for multi-hit dungeons
doom_tower: Same as Dungeons - Warmaster, full Offense, partial Support
faction_wars: Same as Dungeons - Warmaster for damage, support for utility

blessings: Brimstone (Phantom Touch tree): Bonus damage on buffs - synergizes with A3 Inc ATK buff
Crushing Rend (Cruelty tree): Max HP damage - useful for tanky targets in Arena/Doom Tower
Blessings of Battle (Phantom Touch tree): Extra turn chance - pairs with passive revive for double nuke opportunity
Temporal Chains (Temporal Chains tree): TM control - extends control window after Fear lands

ai_quirks.ai_issue_description: AI generally smart - prioritizes A3 on cooldown, uses A2 for damage/sustain. May waste A3 buff on low-health allies in some scenarios but not a significant issue.

cheese_strategy.cheese_type: Revive comp enabler, Swift Parry instant-kill gimmick
cheese_strategy.cheese_mechanic_info: Revive passive enables end-game Clan Boss cheese comps (keep DPS alive longer). Arena cheese: Swift Parry set + Extra Turn = revive → instant proc chance → A3 nuke for 1-shot potential. Requires high C.DMG build and timing.

mechanics_advisory: Arena specialist with unique revive-nuke gimmick. True Fear is SUPERIOR to Fear (blocks A1 too). A3 Inc ATK buff applies BEFORE damage for self-boosted nuke - huge burst potential. A2 conditional 50% heal (vs Feared targets) synergizes with A3 Fear spread for massive sustain. Passive 40% damage boost <40% HP makes Brakus dangerous when low. Fire Knight specialist (6-hit A2 + 3-hit A3 = 9 hits for shield). Booking priority: A2 first (100% Weaken, -2 CD), then Passive (-2 CD for Arena), A3 last (True Fear 75%). Master Hexer no longer extends Fear duration (2023 patch) - community guide conflict. Warmaster procs twice on A2 for exceptional damage.
